text: current use taxation definition of open space land land used to harbor animal species excluded amend rsa ix to read as follows open space land means any or all farm land forest land or unproductive land as defined by this section however open space land shall not include any property held by a city town or district in another city or town for the purpose of a water supply or flood control for which a payment in place of taxes is made in accordance with rsa nor shall open space land include any farm land or forest land used to harbor animal species
